verses.1: Leitung le a tunga omte, leitung le a tunga teengte Topa -aʼ ahi hi.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tuipite sungah a bul phut a, tui tungah a kipsak hi.
verses.3: Topaʼ mual tungah kuate kah to ding ahi hiam? Ama mun siangtho ah kuate ding ding ahi hiam?
verses.4: Gamtat siangtho le lungsim siangtho a nei, a man lo thu ah a nuntakna pia loin, khemna tawh a kiciam lo mite ahi hi.
verses.5: Tua bang mite in Topaʼ tung panin thupha ngah ding uh a, amaute a hon khia Pasianʼ kiang panin diksakna ngah ding uh hi.
verses.6: Tua bang mite pen, amah a zong, Jakobʼ Pasianʼ mai a zong minam ahi hi.
verses.7: Minthang Kumpipa hong tum theih nadingin, kulh kongpite lian hon unla, tanglai kongkhakte gol hon un.
verses.8: Minthang Kumpipa kua ahi hiam? Hatin a vanglian Topa, galhat Topa ahi hi.
verses.9: Minthang Kumpipa hong tum theih nadingin, kulh kongpite lian hon unla, tanglai kongkhakte gol hon un.
verses.10: Hih a minthang Kumpipa kua ahi hiam? Vanglian Topa, minthang Kumpipa ahi hi.
